articles.title: Join NASA's Virtual Social for the CAPSTONE Launch to the Moon - NASA
articles.description: As a pathfinder for Gateway, a Moon-orbiting outpost that is part of NASA’s Artemis program, CAPSTONE will help reduce risk for future spacecraft by validating innovative navigation technologies and verifying the dynamics of this halo-shaped orbit.
